00395   public AbstractBioDOM(String propertiesfile) throws BioDOMException {
00396     warningBox = new BioDOMWarningBox();
00397     if (propertiesfile != null) {
00398             this.propertiesfile = new File(propertiesfile);
00399         }
00400     setProperties();
00401   }

00409     public AbstractBioDOM(File propertiesfile) throws BioDOMException {
00410         warningBox = new BioDOMWarningBox();
00411         this.propertiesfile = propertiesfile;
00412         setProperties();

00426     /*
00427      *  (non-Javadoc)
00428      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.AbstractBioDOMInterface#validate()
00429      */
00430   public boolean validate() { 
00431         log.config("call validate()");
00432         try {
00433           // create new Validator
00434             final Validator validator = SCHEMA.newValidator();
00435             //  validate  
00436             validator.validate(new DOMSource(dom)); 
00437             return true; 
00438         } catch(IOException e){
00439             log.severe("BioDOM validation (IOException): Error reading internal document!");
00440         } catch(SAXException e){
00441             log.warning("BioDOM validation (SaxException): Error parsing/validating internal document:\n"+e.getMessage());
00442 
00443         }
00444         return false;   
00445   }

00447     /*
00448      *  (non-Javadoc)
00449      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.AbstractBioDOMInterface#validate(java.net.URL)
00450      */
00451   public boolean validate(final URL xsd) {
00452     InputStream is;
00453     try {
00454       is = xsd.openStream();
00455     } catch (IOException e) {
00456       log.severe("BioDOM validation (IOException): Error reading inputstream!");
00457       return false;
00458     }
00459     return validate(is);
00460   }

00462   /*
00463      *  (non-Javadoc)
00464      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.AbstractBioDOMInterface#validate(java.io.InputStream)
00465    */
00466   public boolean validate(final InputStream is) {
00467     log.config("call validate (InputStream)");
00468         try {
00469             // create new Schema
00470             final Schema schema = sfactory.newSchema(new StreamSource(is));
00471             // create new Validator
00472             final Validator validator = schema.newValidator();
00473             // validate
00474             validator.validate(new DOMSource(dom));
00475             return true;
00476                 
00477             } catch (IOException e){
00478                 log.severe("BioDOM validation (IOException): Error reading internal document");
00479             } catch(SAXException e){
00480                 log.warning("BioDOM validation (SaxException): Error parsing/validating internal document!");
00481             }
00482             return false;         
00483   }

00487    */
00488   public void setDom(final String xmlstring) throws BioDOMException {
00489     try {
00490       final InputSource is = new InputSource(new StringReader(xmlstring));    
00491       dom = DB.parse(is);
00492     } catch (IOException e) {
00493       throw new BioDOMException("String unparseable (IOException)");
00494     } catch (SAXException e) {
00495       throw new BioDOMException("String unparseable (SAXException)");
00496     }
00497   }

00501    */
00502   public void setDom(final Document submitted_dom) throws BioDOMException {
00503      dom = submitted_dom;
00504        if (!validate()) {
00505            log.severe("couldn't init, XML validation failed");
00506            throw new BioDOMException("couldnt init, XML validation failed");
00507        }
00508   }

00518   /*
00519    * (non-Javadoc)
00520    * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.AbstractBioDOMInterface#getDom(boolean)
00521    */
00522   public Document getDom( final boolean validate ) throws BioDOMException{
00523     if ( isNillable ) {
00524       final Element documentElement = dom.getDocumentElement();
00525         if ( documentElement.getChildNodes().getLength() == 0 ) {
00526           documentElement.setAttribute( "xsi:nil", "true" );
00527         }
00528         else {
00529           documentElement.removeAttribute( "xsi:nil" );
00530         }
00531     }
00532     
00533     // If validation is unwanted, just return the DOM
00534     if ( !validate ) return dom;
00535     //If you reach this point, validation IS wanted, so validate. If OK, return DOM
00536     if ( validate() ) return dom;
00537     //If you reach this point, validation has failed. Therefore, log an error and throw an Exception
00538       log.severe("Document not valid!");
00539       throw new BioDOMException("Document contains no valid Document Data!");
00540   }
00541 
00547   protected String generateId() {
00548     //prepare random String for unique IDs
00549     final Random rand = new Random();
00550     StringBuffer myRnd = new StringBuffer();
00551         myRnd.append("ID");
00552     for (int n = 0; n < 10; n++) {//length is 10 now ... ;)
00553       myRnd = myRnd.append(ID_CHARS.charAt(rand.nextInt(ID_CHARS.length())));
00554     }
00555     log.config("generated ID " + myRnd.toString());
00556     return myRnd.toString();
00557   }
00558 
00564   private void setProperties() throws BioDOMException {
00565     properties = new Properties();
00566     try {
00567       if (propertiesfile == null) {
00568         log.config("load BioDOM config from default ...");
00569         final InputStream in = getClass().getResourceAsStream("/config/BioDOM.properties.xml");     
00570         properties.loadFromXML(in);
00571       } else {
00572         log.config("load BioDOM config from " + propertiesfile);
00573         properties.loadFromXML(new FileInputStream(propertiesfile));           
00574       }
00575       log.config("properties loaded ...");
00576         } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
00577             log.severe("An FileNotFoundException occurred while opening "+propertiesfile);
00578             throw new BioDOMException("An FileNotFoundException occurred while opening "+propertiesfile);
00579     } catch (IOException e) {
00580             log.severe("An IOException occurred while reading properties!");
00581       throw new BioDOMException("An IOException occurred while reading properties!");
00582     }
00583         // set NAMESPACE for current BioDOM object
00584         NAMESPACE = properties.getProperty("BioDOM.namespace."+getClass().getSimpleName());
00585         if (NAMESPACE == null) {
00586             throw new BioDOMException("NS for BioDOM class "+getClass().getSimpleName()+" not found!");
00587         }
00588         // set remote NAMESPACELOCATION
00589         NSLOCATION = properties.getProperty("BioDOM.nslocation.remote."+NAMESPACE);
00590         if (NSLOCATION == null) {
00591             throw new BioDOMException("remote NSLOCATION for NS "+NSLOCATION+" not found!");
00592         }
00593         final String NSLOCALLOCATION = properties.getProperty("BioDOM.nslocation.jar."+NAMESPACE);
00594         if (NSLOCALLOCATION == null) {
00595             throw new BioDOMException("local NSLOCATION for NS "+NSLOCALLOCATION+" not found!");
00596         }
00597         // set SCHEMA for current BioDOM object
00598         try {
00599             sfactory.setResourceResolver(RESOLVER);
00600             sfactory.setErrorHandler(new ValidationErrorHandler());
00601             SCHEMA = sfactory.newSchema(new StreamSource(getClass().getResourceAsStream(NSLOCALLOCATION)));
00602            
00603             log.config("SCHEMA object: "+SCHEMA.toString());    
00604         } catch (SAXException e){
00605             throw new BioDOMException("Error parsing schema from resource ("+NSLOCALLOCATION+")");
00606         } 
00607         
00608         // set DocumentBuilder for current BioDOM object
00609         try {
00610             dbfactory.setNamespaceAware(true);
00611             dbfactory.setSchema(SCHEMA);
00612             DB = dbfactory.newDocumentBuilder();
00613         } catch (ParserConfigurationException e){
00614             throw new BioDOMException("ParserConfigurationException while creating new DocumentBuilder");
00615         }
00616         
00617   }
00618 
00624   protected String getTextContent(final Node node) {
00625     String text = null;
00626 
00627     if(node != null) {
00628       final NodeList children = node.getChildNodes();
00629 
00630       if(children != null) {
00631         for(int i = 0; i < children.getLength(); i++) {
00632           if(children.item(i).getNodeType() == Node.TEXT_NODE) {
00633             text = children.item(i).getNodeValue();
00634             break;
00635           }
00636         }
00637       }
00638     }
00639     return text;
00640   }

00642   /* (non-Javadoc)
00643  * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.AbstractBioDOMInterface#toString()
00644  */
00645   public String toString() {
00646       try {
00647         final Document doc = getDom( false );
00648           final StringWriter strWtr = new StringWriter();
00649           final OutputFormat format = new OutputFormat(doc, "UTF-8", true);
00650           final XMLSerializer output = new XMLSerializer(strWtr, format);
00651           output.serialize(doc);
00652           return strWtr.toString();
00653       } catch (IOException e) {
00654           return "Can't serialize current object \n" + e.getMessage();
00655       } catch (BioDOMException e) {
00656     return "BioDom: " +e.getLocalizedMessage();
00657   }
00658   }

00717   public static Document transform(final String NS1, final String NS2, final Document doc) throws StylesheetNotAvailableException, NSNotSupportedException, TransformerConfigurationException, TransformerException, BioDOMException{
00718       return transform("",NS1,NS2,doc);
00719   }
00720   
00736   public static Document transform(final String catalogpropertiesfile, final String NS1, final String NS2, final Document doc) throws StylesheetNotAvailableException, NSNotSupportedException, TransformerConfigurationException, TransformerException, BioDOMException{
00737       
00738       Properties catalogproperties = new Properties();
00739         try {
00740             if (catalogpropertiesfile == null || catalogpropertiesfile.equals("")) {
00741                 log.config("load from default, catalogpropertiesfile is null...");
00742                 final InputStream in = AbstractBioDOM.class.getResourceAsStream("/config/BioDOM.properties.xml");
00743                 if (in != null) {
00744                     catalogproperties.loadFromXML(in);
00745                   log.config("properties loaded");
00746                 } else {
00747                     log.severe("default configuration not found, catalogpropertiesfile is still null!");
00748                     catalogproperties = null;
00749                 }
00750             } else {
00751                 log.config("load from " + catalogpropertiesfile);
00752                 catalogproperties.loadFromXML(new FileInputStream(catalogpropertiesfile));
00753               log.config("properties loaded");
00754             }
00755             log.config("End of set properties...");
00756         } catch (IOException e) {
00757             throw new BioDOMException("An IO Exception occurred while reading "
00758                     + catalogproperties + "!");
00759         }
00760       
00761      
00762         
00763       // get shortcut for NS1 from property
00764       final String sc1 = catalogproperties.getProperty(NS1);
00765       if (sc1 == null) throw new NSNotSupportedException("NS "+NS1+" is not found in properties!");
00766       // read Schema1 to validate input document 
00767       final Schema schema1 = getSchema(NS1);
00768       
00769       // get shortcut for NS2 from property
00770       final String sc2 = catalogproperties.getProperty(NS2);
00771       if (sc2 == null) throw new NSNotSupportedException("NS "+NS2+" is not found in properties!");
00772       // read Schema2 to validate input document 
00773       final Schema schema2 = getSchema(NS2);
00774          
00775       // load xsl file from resources, using name built from sc1 and sc2
00776       final InputStream xsltstream = AbstractBioDOM.class.getResourceAsStream("/resources/xsl/"+sc1+"_to_"+sc2+".xsl");
00777       
00778 
00779           
00780       // check if xsl is available
00781       if (xsltstream == null) {
00782           throw new StylesheetNotAvailableException("No stylesheet available for transform a document from "+NS1+" to "+NS1);
00783       }
00784       
00785       // create new input stream source from xsl stream
00786       final StreamSource xsltSource = new StreamSource(xsltstream);
00787       
00788       // create new input source from document
00789       final DOMSource xmlSource = new DOMSource(doc);
00790       // and validate it
00791       final Validator validate1 = schema1.newValidator();
00792       try {
00793           validate1.validate(xmlSource);
00794       } catch (Exception e){
00795           throw new BioDOMException("Input document is invalid against "+NS1);
00796       }
00797       
00798       // create new Result (DOMresult)
00799       final DOMResult xmlResult = new DOMResult();  
00800       // create new Transformer using JAXP    
00801       final TransformerFactory transFact =
00802           TransformerFactory.newInstance();
00803           
00804       final Transformer trans = transFact.newTransformer(xsltSource);
00805       // transform document to result
00806       trans.transform(xmlSource,xmlResult);
00807      
00808   
00809       // validate returned document against NS2
00810       final Validator validate2 = schema2.newValidator();
00811       try {
00812           validate2.validate(new DOMSource((Document)xmlResult.getNode()));
00813       } catch (Exception e){
00814           throw new BioDOMException("Result document is invalid against "+NS2);
00815       }
00816       
00817       // return transformed document
00818       log.config("return transformed XML document");
00819       return (Document)xmlResult.getNode();
00820   }

00833   private static Schema getSchema(String NS)throws BioDOMException {
00834       try {
00835           SchemaFactory sfactory = SchemaFactory.newInstance(XMLConstants.W3C_XML_SCHEMA_NS_URI);
00836           Resolver reso = new Resolver();
00837           sfactory.setResourceResolver(reso);
00838           final Schema schema = sfactory.newSchema(new StreamSource(reso.resolveResource(null,NS,null,null,null).getByteStream()));
00839           return schema;
00840       } catch (SAXException e){
00841           throw new BioDOMException("Error occurred parsing stylesheet "+NS);
00842       }
00843   }
